overview:
Jonas has been with the SEB Group since 1989 and has held different positions within SEB. Before joining SEB Venture Capital in 2000, Jonas worked as a Client Executive with the overall responsibility for a group of small and medium sized companies. Prior to this he worked as Sales & Marketing Manager of financial products.

Jonas holds a degree in Bachelor of Science in Business Administration at JÃ¶nkÃ¶ping International Business School as well as an Global Executive MBA from Stockholm School of Economics in co-operation with Babson University in Boston, Foundacaio Getulio Vargas Business School in Sao Paolo, Indian Institute of Management in Bangalore, Fudan University in Shanghai and Tsinghua University in Beijing.

He has extensive board experience from a number of companies and currently serves on the boards of 3nine AB, KMW Energi AB, ScandiNova Systems AB and is deputy in Cobolt AB.

Phone: +46 8 763 79 05 Cell: +46 70 265 79 05 E-mail: jonas.nyman@seb.se
